dmca.title: Copyright Violation / Third Notification
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

The URL in question is currently not accessible as of 2:15:43 p.m.
(GMT-6) on August 1, 2006.

 

Legal Response Team

The Planet


________________________________

From: Aventure Media [mailto:mail@belfast.aventuremedia.com] 
Posted At: Thursday, July 27, 2006 3:43 AM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: Copyright Violation / Third Notification
Subject: Copyright Violation / Third Notification
Importance: High


For the attention of premiumreseller.com (Provider) and The Planet
(Datacenter Abuse Dept).

The account (mmogaming.co.uk) which you are currently hosting, has
violated international copyright regulations.
This account holder has copied the design of 
http://www.aventurehost.com/old_website, and is using our company
brand logo as their own.

Your customer has been warned, and asked to remove this content, as of
yet they have not provided a response
and the graphics/content are still online at http://wwww.mmogaming.co.uk
<http://wwww.mmogaming.co.uk/> . We also contacted you (Premium
Reseller)
through your website, and have not received a response, and no action
has been taken.

We formally request that this website is taken offline.
If this data is still present online within the next 24hrs, we will
continue to contact upstream providers and your
datacenter. If we do not reach a resolution to this request, we will
begin legal action against the account holder and
yourself for hosting this content, knowing, that the content is a breach
of copyright through our notifications.

Datacenter - Server Exploited
In addition to this, the website http://www.premiumreseller.com
<http://www.premiumreseller.com/>  has been exploited, we would
recommend
taking this server offline from your network as the server has been
possibly rooted/exploited, a screenshot
has been attached to this email confirming the current state of this
website.

Information for The Planet Datacenter
IP address: 70.84.77.168
Reverse DNS: a8.4d.5446.static.theplanet.com.
Reverse DNS authenticity: [Verified]
ASN: 21844
ASN Name: THEPLANET-AS 



Best Regards,

RICHARD KENNEDY
Aventure Media Operations Manager
United States - Ireland - United Kingdom

Visit us online at www.aventurehost.com <http://www.aventurehost.com/> 
Email: richard@belfast.aventuremedia.com
Postal: 2 Woodstock Link, Belfast, BT6 8DD
Direct Line: 0870 080 1744 - Ext 4




        -----Original Message-----
        From: Aventure Media [mailto:mail@belfast.aventuremedia.com] 
        Sent: 21 July 2006 13:26
        To: Admin@MMoGaming.co.uk; Vempire@MMoGaming.co.uk
        Subject: Stolen Design
        Importance: High
        
        
          Dear User,
        
          You have ripped the layout, and logo on your website from
        http://www.aventurehost.com <http://www.aventurehost.com/> 
          Please remove this website within 24hrs, you have stolen the
content, and
        logo from Aventure Host.
          If this website is not removed within 24hrs, your web hosting
provider
        will be contacted.
          This is the only warning you will be issued with.
        
          Aventure Media Abuse
          http://www.aventurehost.com <http://www.aventurehost.com/>
